name: philia
0:
”Alexa open philia food assistant”
”Alexa, start philia food assistant”
”Alexa, launch philia food assistant”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: philia food assistant
des: PHILIA is an Alexa Conversations Skill, that provides over 2 million recipes that are indexed, normalized, and contain full nutrition information. The skill allows for search by nutrient quantity, 40 diet, and health labels as well as keyword searches by cuisine type (chinese, italian, indian, french,...), meal type (lunch, dinner, breakfast, snack) or dish type (soup, salad, pizza, sandwich,...). But for now , it only search for some specific diet labels.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
